name: July (Leprethan)
description:
Your name is July, and it just so happens that it is also the month of July. Only problem is, you live in Texas and the weather dropped to -30 F over night. Your dad has gone out to investigate but has not been back for awhile. You go out and traverse the snowy landscape to find you dad. 

But there are other things that came with the cold and snow.....

Gampad or Keyboard controls:

Left Joystick / Arrow Keys : Move

Xbox A / Z key: Select / Tiptoe

Xbox X / X Key: Pickup / Throw

Start / Enter / Escape: Pause

IMPORTANT: Sorry I didn't make it clear enough in the game but -The black monsters with teeth will stop following you if you on on top of the Boulders

and remember it is better to avoid things than be offensive
